Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```


Write a function that randomly draws birthdays out of 365 days & run the function 10000 times for each group size 2-50
```{r}
sim_birthday = function (n) {
birthdays = sample(1:365, n, replace = TRUE)
any(duplicated(birthdays))
}
birthday_results = expand_grid(
  groupsize = 2:50,
  iter = 1:10000
)|>
  mutate(duplicate=map_lgl(groupsize, sim_birthday))|>
  group_by(groupsize)|>
  summarize(prob=mean(duplicate))
```

Make a plot
```{r}
ggplot(birthday_results, aes(x=groupsize, y=prob)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = "group size",
    y = "probability"
  )
```
